thread.title_full: Lily-Rose Depp, 17, sports baggy sweatshirt and leggings | Daily Mail Online

author: Dailymail.Com Reporter
title: Lily-Rose Depp, 17, sports baggy sweatshirt and leggings | Daily Mail Online
text: Share 55 shares Lily-Rose was made the face of Chanel No 5 L'Eau last year, and last week she was the star of the show at Chanel's Haute Couture Spring/Summer show in Paris wearing a stunning ruffled pink number with frills on the arms and dramatic train. Dressed down: The pretty teen sported over-sized tortoiseshell sunglasses and wore her hair tied back into a messy ponytail as she exited the arrivals area at LAX Natural beauty: She wore a baggy charcoal gray sweatshirt and navy blue leggings for her long journey and wasn't wearing any make-up Rising fashion star: The casual attire only served to highlight Lily-Rose's model thin frame Lily-Rose arrived back in LA as details emerged about her famous father's lavish lifestyle. In documents filed in court in LA as part of a legal battle between Depp and his former managers, it's revealed the Pirates Of The Caribbean star spends $30,000 a month on wine and splashed out $3 million to blast the ashes of the late author Hunter S. Thompson over Aspen, Colorado, from a specially-made cannon. He also spent $18 million on a luxury yacht and maintained 14 residences and 12 storage facilities housing his fine art and memorabilia collections. The Management Gropup is asking a judge to rule that Depp has no-one to blame but himself for current money troubles after the actor sued them for 'mishandling' his finances. Catwalk queen: Lily-Rose was the star of Chanel's Haute Couture Show in Paris last week, walking the runway in a stunning ruffled pink number with frills on the arms and dramatic train Famous genes: Lily-Rose is the daughter of Hollywood star Johnny Depp and French model and actress Vanessa Paradis who starred in Chanel's 1990 brand campaign. The former couple, pictured in 2008, split in 2012 after 14 years together Share or comment on this article 55
